## Dependency Attribution

```mermaid
pie title Dependency Licenses
    "Apache-2.0" : 45
    "MIT" : 35
    "BSD" : 15
    "Other" : 5
```

## License Distribution

$$
\text{Compatibility} = \frac{\text{Compatible Licenses}}{\text{Total Dependencies}}
$$

| Category | Count | Percentage |
| ---------- | ------- | ------------ |
| Apache-2.0 | 45 | 45% |
| MIT | 35 | 35% |
| BSD | 15 | 15% |
| Other OSS | 5 | 5% |
